scripts.sentry:release: export VERSION=$(sentry-cli releases propose-version); sentry-cli releases new -p ficus-rate-limiter $VERSION; sentry-cli releases set-commits --auto $VERSION
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org anderapps --project ficus-rate-limiter ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org anderapps --project ficus-rate-limiter ./dist
